text: Niko Verona (stage name), whose real name is Maciej Zamiatowski (born March 5, 1985 in Warsaw) is a Polish actor based in Spain whose career includes television, theater and cinema. He is known for his character as Cachopo in Sky Rojo and as Tom√°s in the feature film Standard. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Actors from Warsaw Category:Living people Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors
title: Niko Verona
